quoteFirst: _--The rapidity in the accession of the symptoms and fatal termination will, to some extent, depend upon the form in which the poison is taken--_i.e._ in solution or in pill. quoteLast: hours. As a rule, if the person lives for two hours after the onset of symptoms recovery may be expected.

quoteFirst: The relief over, it became known that zero for the attack would be at
quoteLast: on the morrow, and thereupon a weird silence fell over all the area of the assembly trenches, where the men were packed like sardines in a tin.
